msbt.message: Oh! In honor of Nature Day, maybe I'll buy a shrub from Leif if I see him.Ahh I just love that time of year when all the plants are set to burst.Everything's coated in the softest layer of green, and the air smells fresh and crisp.The earth is simply miraculous! There's no other way to describe it!

I feel for Leif at this time of year. He's always hopping from island to island, selling seeds and plants. That said, I'm grateful every time he stops on this island.When I've got shrub fever, he's the only one who's got the cure!
If you plant flowers of different colors next to each other, you could end up with a hybrid blossom. I love when gardening can become a little science experiment in your own backyard, .
Nature Day is a great excuse to pick flowers to wear in your hair or brighten up your home. But then again, it's Nature Day, so maybe I should just leave the beautiful blossoms untouched
It's easy to take our island for granted, but Nature Day reminds us that it's our most precious resource.
